text: Rafal Korc (born 9 March 1982) is a Paralympic athlete from Poland who competes in T20 classification middle-distance running events. Korc represented Poland at the 2012 Summer Paralympics in London, where he won bronze in the 1500 m race. He has been selected for three IPC Athletics World Championships, but he has been unable to replicate his Paralympic Games success, with his best finish being 5th at the 2013 Games in Lyon. == References == Category:Paralympic athletes of Poland Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Poland Category:Living people Category:1982 births Category:Polish male middle-distance runners Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople from Warsaw Category:Paralympic medalists in athletics (track and field)
title: Rafal Korc
